long_description: The 30 in. inseam REI Pulaski pants are built tough to withstand trail work, travel and everyday adventures. Made from certified 100% organic cotton canvas for breathable comfort and easy care. 7.5 oz. cotton canvas fabric stands up to your outdoor-inspired lifestyle. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Double-panel knees and reinforced back hems resist wear and tear while working in the outdoors. Standard 5-pocket design stows all the essentials; side drop-in pocket keeps a cell phone within reach. Gusseted crotch allows unrestricted range of motion. Relaxed fit eases movement.
short_description: The 30 in. inseam REI Pulaski pants are built tough to withstand trail work, travel and everyday adventures.
